name: SANATAN UNNAYAN SANGSTHA
briefDescription: SANATAN UNNAYAN SANGSTHA (sus), a South Assam based Non Government No Profit Voluntary Organisation registered under Societies Registration Act in Cachar since Nov 2006. The Organization is serving the downtrodden, disadvantaged group of rural and other vulnerable people.VISION:A Happy Society - where everyone lives with self-respect, dignity and pride. MISSION:•To provide cost effective, sustainable people- friendly health and education for women, children & adolescents of weaker sections of Society.•To provide employment to unemployed youth & women of the disadvantaged sections of Society through agriculture and other engagements.•To provide pre, during & post disaster needs of the Society.
